channel.title: 2010 remake?
channel.description:
Can someone make a remake of 2010-2011? With quests, mini games, etc. Personally, I started in 2006. But I like 2010 - 2011 before the armor/loadstone update. The loadstone update is making Runescape players and people in general lazy.. And the Armor update is fucking gay, it's nothing close to medieval times, isn't Runescape supposed to be medieval?
IGN: aRealPotato

item.title: 2010 remake?
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

it was already fucked in that era. for me.

Read full topic

item.title: 2010 remake?
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:18, topic:460703”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=563637.msg4109172#msg4109172 date=1348357820]
Yeah, eventually. Multirevision and whatnot.
[/quote]

I saw that one server developed by ry60003333 and he has 508 and 317 support. It’s really cool actually and it’s on his server status page advertisement.

[quote author=Server status page]

508and317.png1251×501

[/quote][/quote]

Wouldn’t be ridiculously hard to make. Iirc, the client sends the revision on connection (if it doesn’t, it wouldn’t be hard to make it) and so you just store the player’s revision and send/read packets accordingly.

Read full topic

item.title: 2010 remake?
item.dc:creator: @SCFTW SCFTW
item.description:

[quote=“Ruby, post:8, topic:460703”][quote author=KroniKz_ link=topic=563637.msg4107644#msg4107644 date=1348175406]
I like the era when I first started runescape was around 2009, because everything was fun and the graphics werent as laggy as they are now. Everything was coolor like the feel of the game. Anyways this isn’t runescape discussion. No requests, anyways why would someone make you this. Do it yourself.
[/quote]

you only started in 2009?! I started 4/5 years before that, rofl.[/quote]

I started in the 1950’s. yesh so trueh

Read full topic

item.title: 2010 remake?
item.dc:creator: @Teemo Teemo
item.description:
@Teemo wrote:

[quote=“The Web Guy, post:10, topic:460703”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=563637.msg4107021#msg4107021 date=1348101904]

Can someone make a remake of 2010-2011? With quests, mini games, etc. Personally, I started in 2006. But I like 2010 - 2011 before the armor/loadstone update. The loadstone update is making Runescape players and people in general lazy… And the Armor update is fucking gay, it’s nothing close to medieval times, isn’t Runescape supposed to be medieval?

IGN: aRealPotato
[/quote]There is never going to be a complete remaked of any era. Its possible, but HIGHLY unlikely. No one is going to attempt this though just because you simply requested it.

However, some people can, and do get very close to being precise and exact when it comes to remakes. I think a 2010 remake would be cool. Most are 2006 remakes, because that’s what most people like, and in my honest opinion, that’s when Runescape was at its best. Now it’s shit (personal opinion).[/quote]
Personally, I liked Runescape from 2006 - 2011 after the shit armor update and all of that crap…

Read full topic

item.title: 2010 remake?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:2, topic:460703”][quote author=Teemo link=topic=563637.msg4107019#msg4107019 date=1348101686]
Can someone make a remake of 2010-2011? With quests, mini games, etc. Personally, I started in 2006. But I like 2010 - 2011 before the armor/loadstone update. The loadstone update is making Runescape players and people in general lazy… And the Armor update is fucking gay, it’s nothing close to medieval times, isn’t Runescape supposed to be medieval?

IGN: aRealPotato
[/quote]There is never going to be a complete remaked of any era. Its possible, but HIGHLY unlikely. No one is going to attempt this though just because you simply requested it.[/quote]

However, some people can, and do get very close to being precise and exact when it comes to remakes. I think a 2010 remake would be cool. Most are 2006 remakes, because that’s what most people like, and in my honest opinion, that’s when Runescape was at its best. Now it’s shit (personal opinion).

Read full topic

item.title: 2010 remake?
item.dc:creator: @Teemo Teemo
item.description:
@Teemo wrote:

KroniKz_:

anyways why would someone make you this. Do it yourself.

I want to. But I’m not sure if I have what it takes. I will try. If I don’t find this fun at all. I might quit. But in most cases, I do find Java fun. I will work on it.

2010 and 2011 revisions please.

Read full topic

item.title: 2010 remake?
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

runescape sucks:

Most people are too lazy for hard skills such as construction and farming, dungeoneering(if this was out)

Yes, dungeoneering was released April 12th, 2010

Most people weren’t a big fan of the 2010 era, then again, some people are.
As Riipiin said, no one is going to create a 2010 remake just because you requested it.
